text: “Egh ia kuarazibar tongɨn kuarazir kamagh garibar aman markɨ. Ia kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, da bizir bar kurar kɨ aghuaziba. Kuarazir kaba, taragiaba, mɨghɨaba, isaba, kotkotba, poneba, ongarimɨn kuaraziba, beniba, dɨpamɨn mughamiziba, aghunabar ekiaba ko, kina aghunababa. Ia kuarazir kabar aman markɨ.
